mention.text: the vessel is resting on a shelf on the reef Efforts to begin pumping 200,000 gallons of oil off the Exxon Valdez onto another tanker , the Exxon Baton Rouge , were halted early Saturday when authorities noticed that oil appeared to leaking as the pumping operation proceeded Eleven of 17 tanks that lie forward of the ship 's masthead were ruptured in the accident
another tanker , the Exxon Baton Rouge
Whenever you has to be done in a controlled manner
the Exxon Valdez and the Exxon Baton Rouge
